name: Barbarian Baking Brawl
description:
How to play: Press space to attack and throw spear,  W A S D or Arrow keys to move around.

 Your task is just to kill enemies and survive for as long as possible. Story: You're a barbarian out in the wild slaughtering goblins as an act of revenge due to them slaughtering your whole tribe. In return you decided to commit mass genocide against the goblins.
